Specifications

PVC Pura Backing
Pile material PA6/Econyl (57%/43%) PA6/Econyl (57%/43%)
Backing PVC PVC
Primary backing nonwoven PET/PA nonwoven PET/PA
Yarn construction Velour Velour
Pattern Plain Plain
Colours 10 10
Use class EN 1307 33 33
Pile weight ISO 8543 900 gr/m2 900 gr/m2
Total weight ISO 8543 3.700 gr/m2 3.700 gr/m2
Pile height ISO 1766 6 mm 6 mm
Total height ISO 1765 8.5 mm 8.5 mm
Pile density ISO 8543 0,128 0,128
Number of stitches ISO 1763 118.000 /m2 118.000 /m2
